author: Special Correspondent
text: The Alagappa University has announced results for the examinations held in December 2015 for the Under Graduate and Post Graduate, Professional, M Phil, PG Diploma and Certificate courses and hosted the same in the university website www. alagappauniversity.ac.in. Students may apply for revaluation of answer scripts in the format, which can be downloaded from the website, Gurumallesh Prabu, Controller of Examinations said in a release. The duly filled-in application for revaluation along with a DD for Rs.500 per subject (favouring Registrar, Alagappa University payable at Karaikudi) should reach the Controller of Examinations on or before March 4, he said.
title: Results published
